DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to demonstrate the CervicalMD device's ability to collect digital imagery suitable for a colposcopy examination.
DOC.brief_title: Investigation of the Uterine Cervix Using CervicalMD
DOC.criteria: Female Negative Pregnancy test Abnormal Pap smear 18 years and older Presence of a cervix Pregnant Absence of a cervix Less than 18 years old Male
